text: The Al Mezan Center for Human Rights () or Al Mezan () is a non-governmental organization based in the Palestinian Jabalia (a Palestinian refugee ) in the Gaza Strip in the Occupied Palestinian Territory. Mezan () means balance, scales, justice, and equity, in Arabic. == References == == Other websites == * https://www.mezan.org/ Category:Organizations based in Palestine
title: Al Mezan Center for Human Rights
